reviews.review: El juego es buenardo, es de lo mejor para jugar con amigos a la madrugada.

Muy buen juego de JvsJ asimetrico. Si te gusta la sensacion de poder y dominacion, jugar asesino te satisfacera. Si te gusta sentirte desprotegido, a la merced de que no te escuchen, y en general a jugar cuidadosamente a un juego de miedo, puedes darle un intento a ser un supervivimiente. Lamentablemente una vez que abandonas el aspecto casual del juego yy te vas a ser competitivo se pierde toda la magia.
Really good wish Jason voorhees was on this tbh/ Friday 13th
Imagine a game that is 5 years old yet still has as many bugs as a pre-alpha. Good going useless devs.
Was quite traumatized by the killers in the first few games lol

o importante de um jogo pra mim é divertir o jogador e esse jogo conseguiu comigo, mas é claro que a certos bugs e isso provavelmente será consertado algum dia, assim como novos bugs vão surgir, mas que jogo não tem bugs e glithchses.
Tirando a parte da comunidade tóxica, é um bom jogo.

Es muy recomendable para jugar con uno o mas amigos, como sobreviviente la gente es bastante egoísta y cada tanto te encontraras con algún asesino toxico. El juego es muy bueno, con un toque adictivo, pero eso si, no siempre encuentra partida rápido y a veces aburre bastante esperar partida.
This game is outstanding and is highly recommended we need more players so go ahead and download and lets have fun good job devs two thumbs up

It's fun for the first few hours....but that's how they get you. They'll then trap you in a never ending cycle of being bullied to the point where you start to think that you've entered the entity's realm, with the only thing keeping you is the hope, that you might have a fair and fun game next time.

Don't make my mistake, save yourself before you too become trapped!

Incompetent Developers and Management, Toxic Community, and Buggy every fucking update. This game also does not respect your time or money or you as a player. It took a literal boycott to get a nice QOL update with significant Buffs/Nerfs and it was still buggy and broken. The Balance is awful the same perks have been META for years. BHVR only cares about your money don't spend a dime on this game.

 I hope VHS a new 4v1 Asymmetrical  horror game is very well made and fun if is I'm hopping ship. Its going to be FREE and the developers seem to care a lot about player-base and are aware of the mess that is Dead By Daylight.


If you are looking for a real review this is it.

TLDR: THIS GAME IS NOT IS NOT WORTH YOUR TIME EFFORT OR MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

just bought this game (april 2021) for me it still worth to buy, its really fun and i just had different experience when i play this compare to another horror/thriller games. but of course there something not good about it, no voice chat or even team chat in game make me harder when i play solo, its just really strange when this game has less communication system meanwhile you need team-work as survivor. but actually its fine if you have discord friends or you just play as killer. uh also a lot collaboration with another games/movies make me more excited to play this. you should try it out :)

Killers are op and half of them just camp. And Que times are forever, especially if  youre a higher rank. Its still fun but the game favors the killers and start to make it not fun. You get off a hook just to get put back on it 2 seconds later cuz the killers perks are too good. And dont get me started on the saw one. it adds an extra element but its waaayyyy to op.
Love the game has a a few balancing issues but overall 10/10
oyunda geceleri arkadaşlarla birlikte girmek imkansız nerdeyse. 3 kişiyiz ama bir maç bulmak en az 8 9 dakika sürüyor ciddi bir bekleme var o yüzden pek önermem kimseye.

Jogo excepcional para se divertir sozinho ou com os amigos. Logo após a compra do game, fiquei confuso sobre como era sua mecânica e o principal objetivo do modo sobrevivente, mas jogando apenas duas partidas confesso que peguei o jeito e não larguei até agora o game. 9/10
Ist ganz oki aber naja man sollte nicht so Killer Freundlich sein und die Fehler müssten auch mal behoben werden ansonsten ein geiles Game

I have 700 hours of this game on my Xbox and it is still so fun to play. The lag and bugs can make this game not fun at times, but if you take a small break, you will be ready to play in no time. This is a phenomenal game and it deserves so much than its already gotten. I hope you found this helpful. Also at the time of typing this, the deluxe edition is on sale for cheaper than the normal game.

                                                                                                                                            - pixoil
